Countertop oven that air fries, bakes, roasts, toasts, reheats, and broils with steam infusion.

Product FAQ

Is this air fryer big enough for a family?

It lists a capacity of Compact oven for single-pan meals, which can work for family-size portions depending on what you cook.

How well does this air fryer crisp food?

It includes Air fry, bake, roast, toast, reheat, broil, so you can adjust settings to target crisping.

Does it take up a lot of counter space?

It uses a countertop oven air fryer style, so check your counter space before buying.

Does it use steam during cooking?

It includes Steam infusion, which adds steam during cooking.
